isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR STRIKER PIN

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Striker Pin on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 47 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Front cab door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab door lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 73) . Front cab door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab door lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab door lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and remove two torx head bolts (Item 4) to remove the front cab door striker pin (Item 1) from the floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab door lock pillar (Item 2).

figure.caption: Figure 47. Front Cab Door Striker Pin

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. FLOATING TAPPED STRIKER PIN MOUNTING PLATE

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door striker pin.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Striker Pin on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

Crew cab rear door striker pin (Item 1) mounted on cab lock pillar (Item 2) provides for positive engagement with the door latch assembly (Item 7, Figure 75) . Crew cab rear door striker pin removal and installation requires a torx head tool (Item 3). Enlarged mounting holes in cab lock pillar and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab lock pillar permits adjustment.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 3) and remove two torx head bolts (Item 4) to remove the crew cab rear door striker pin (Item 1) from the floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 5) located inside cab lock pillar (Item 2), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 48. Crew Cab Rear Door Striker Pin

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. CREW CAB REAR DOOR STRIKER PIN
5. FLOATING TAPPED STRIKER PIN MOUNTING PLATE

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side crew cab rear door striker pin.
